text: Sean Morton trellis I run corporate
strategy for us so key market trends for
trellix are extended detection and
response or xdr and that is looking at
the entire threat landscape and bringing
together security events to tell the
end-to-end to attack and understanding
what happened in your environment so
trellix is a combination of McAfee and
FireEye we've been working with AWS for
about the past 10 years now we choose
AWS simply because it allows us to focus
on what we're really good at security
and not focus on the undifferentiated
heavy lifting that AWS provides us so
AWS helps my software company be more
focused on what we are good at and that
is building great security workflows for
our customers
foreign
